title: Fragment, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: compound weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. DeWitt Clinton Cohen
description: White satin ground with design of a branch with a cluster of fruit, worked partly in continuous supplementary wefts of green and rose, and partly in discontinuous supplementary wefts of gray silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: silk
Technique: compound weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade). Gift of Mrs. DeWitt Clinton Cohen. 1923-7-20.
